snippet: Gilad Shalit, who was seized by Palestinian militants in a cross-border raid in 2006, said in a rare interview that he feared that if he were left too long, his captors “would make me disappear.”
lead_paragraph: Gilad Shalit, who was seized by Palestinian militants in a cross-border raid in 2006, said in a rare interview that he feared that if he were left too long, his captors “would make me disappear.”

headline.seo: Former Israeli Soldier Shalit Recalls Captivity Under Militants
headline.main: Israeli Ex-Soldier Recalls Captivity Under Militants
headline.print_headline: Israeli Ex-Soldier Recalls Captivity Under Militants
